osvSchema.summary: spring-projects/spring-data-redis: Depending upon JCenter/Bintray as an artifact repository
osvSchema.details:
spring-projects/spring-data-redis: Depending upon JCenter/Bintray as an artifact repository

Using a deprecated artifact repository may eventually give attackers access for a supply chain attack.
This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in spring-projects/spring-data-redis version 2.5.1 by commit a638a54b587dc50d765b0e37fcb5ca4e4cfa031a. For more details please see the references link.
